name: J4F Hostage Rescue
description:
Fight your way through Zerg to save the hostage androids. Then defeat the Zerg boss to complete the level. 

FPS Sci-fi hostage rescue. A quick single level demo of a project I have been working on in Unity. I have always liked the "on rails" FPS shooters that made you think a little. Those like Half-Life and Halo that where more than just a "kill everything" experience. 

This demo is a simple concept of a single level that would be part of a much larger storyline. I'm going to continue to expand the game but I'm going to start it all over again. There are many things I don't like about it but it's a good start. This is also the first project that I can say is "good enough" to publish. I have dozens of uncompleted projects so this is a bit of a milestone for me.

Anyway, I hope you find it entertaining for 5 minutes. Let me know what you think.

Thanks!

Known issues:

  1. Doors may prevent bullets to pass when line of sight is very close to the frame of the door.
